turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Guided bone and tissue regeneration.
turn.1: What is the advantage of using a membrane?
turn.2: There is no need for a second surgery to remove the membrane, this will prevent any disruption to the healing process of the regenerated tissues.
turn.3: What are the types of membranes?
turn.4: A synthetic resorbable membrane indicated an amount of stable augmented bone similar to that of a collagen resorbable membrane.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: These are the results obtained based on a randomised clinical trial done to compare the stability of augmented bone between a synthetic resorbable membrane and a collagen membrane with guide bone regeneration simultaneous with dental implant placement in the aesthetic zone in terms of facial bone thickness.
turn.8: Success depends on osteoblasts being present at the site, there must be a sufficient blood supply , graft must be stabilised during healing and soft tissue must not be under tension.
